creditline: Gift of Roberta and Richard Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: two-panel huipil; joined in front with a randa; predominantly red round with fine stripes of blue, yellow and green; selvedge edges end in blue stripes; shoulder panel and lower edge patterned with purple chevron pattern with blue accents, possibly executed in a soumak technique; ends are finished with twisted braids.
medium: Cotton, rayon; weft patterning, soumak, embroidery
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
